results.name: a(n) = A002487(1+A005187(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16384
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 0..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences related to Stern's sequences
program: A002487(n) = { my(s=sign(n), a=1, b=0); n = abs(n); while(n>0, if(bitand(n, 1), b+=a, a+=b); n>>=1); (s*b); }; \\ Modified from the one given in A002487, sign not actually needed here.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 20 2019
